actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Aggressive
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The captain makes three attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save.

name: Gelatinous Cube
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces...

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The illithid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute.
